title: Advance into the Inferno
prompt: (masterpiece), (photorealistic), full-body portrait of a brave firefighter walking directly towards the viewer through thick grey smoke and intense orange flames, surrounded by falling embers and debris. The firefighter is fully equipped in heavy-duty turnout gear, a helmet, and a respiratory mask, carrying a coiled hose while simultaneously spraying a powerful stream of water. Low angle, extremely detailed, dramatic cinematic lighting, wet and ruined ground reflects the firelight, destroyed industrial background, 9:16 aspect ratio, volumetric smoke.
negativePrompt: low quality, blurry, worst quality, deformed, mutilated, extra limbs, abstract, disfigured, cartoon, sketch, painting, illustration, drawing, watermark, signature, jpeg artifacts, monochrome, cropped head, too bright, fake fire.
